# The stash

## Stashing

:::: columns
::: {.column width="50%"}
![](figures/git_workflow_stash.drawio.svg)
:::
::: {.column width="50%"}
- Stash is useful when your working directory is dirty and you want to_
  - Switch branch
  - Pull changes from remote
  - Start over but keep the changes just in case
- The `stash` is a stack of local commits
- `git stash` will take changes from the working directory and staging area and commit them to the stash
- `git stash pop` will reapply the last entry of the stash and remove it from the stash
- `git stash apply` will reapply the last entry of the stash
:::
